Strutting Heels Ultimate Value Pack (for Female)

 This pack includes the following: 
 • LMO - High Heels Strut (for Male and Female) 
 • Classic Stiletto Heels - Black (For Female) 
 • Classic Stiletto Heels - Red Gloss (For Female) 
 • Classic Stiletto Heels - Black Gloss (For Female) 
 • Classic Stiletto Heels - Silver Snakeskin (For Female) 
 • Classic Stiletto Heels - Cream (For Female) 
 • Classic Stiletto Heels - Plum (For Female) 
 • Stilettos with Leg Warmers - White (For Female) 
 • Stilettos with Leg Warmers - Grey (For Female) 
 • Stilettos with Leg Warmers - Red Glitter (For Female) 
 • Stilettos with Leg Warmers - Black (For Female) 
 • Stilettos with Leg Warmers - Pink (For Female) 
 • Stiletto Boots with Jeans - Black (for Female) 
 • Stiletto Boots with Jeans - White (for Female) 
 • Stiletto Boots with Jeans - Red (for Female) 
 • Stiletto Boots with Shorts - Black (for Female) 
 • Stiletto Boots with Shorts - White (for Female) 
 • Stiletto Boots with Shorts - Red (for Female) 
 There is no such thing as 'Too Many Shoes.' [#Legal]

 • LMO - Aires con tacón (para hombre y mujer).

 • Zapatos de tacón clásicos; negro brillante (para mujer).
 • Zapatos de tacón clásicos; piel de serpiente plateada (para mujer).
 • Zapatos de tacón clásicos; crema (para mujer).
 • Zapatos de tacón clásicos; ciruela (para mujer).
 • Zapatos de tacón con calentadores; blancos (para mujer).
 • Zapatos de tacón con calentadores; grises (para mujer).
 • Zapatos de tacón con calentadores; purpurina roja (para mujer).
 • Zapatos de tacón con calentadores; negros (para mujer).
 • Zapatos de tacón con calentadores; rosas (para mujer).
 • Botas de tacón con tejanos; negras (para mujer).
 • Botas de tacón con tejanos; blancas (para mujer).
 • Botas de tacón con tejanos; rojas (para mujer).
 • Botas de tacón con shorts; negras (para mujer).
 • Botas de tacón con shorts; blancas (para mujer).
 • Botas de tacón con shorts; rojas (para mujer).
